channel.title: How Do I Delete an NPC?
channel.description:
I want to remove a shopkeeper, not the items in the store, but the npc, how do I do this?
Thanks

item.title: How Do I Delete an NPC?
item.dc:creator: @ThatCrackerZach ThatCrackerZach
item.description:
@ThatCrackerZach wrote:

[quote=“Zezerex, post:4, topic:329958”][quote author=ThatCrackerZach link=topic=426340.msg3131580#msg3131580 date=1266548043]

  1. Find the NPC ID…
  2. Search for the ID In Autospawn.cfg
  3. Delete the entire row!
  4. Run Server ( No Compiling Needed for Autospawn)
    [/quote]Thanks[/quote]
    no problem!

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Delete an NPC?

item.title: How Do I Delete an NPC?
item.dc:creator: @ThatCrackerZach ThatCrackerZach
item.description:
@ThatCrackerZach wrote:

  1. Find the NPC ID…
  2. Search for the ID In Autospawn.cfg
  3. Delete the entire row!
  4. Run Server ( No Compiling Needed for Autospawn)
